CodeUp Manchester The Event The People Activities Resources Sponsors

About

CodeUp is the adult version of Code Club, providing free and friendly adult coding tuition.

The event is an open, friendly and supportive learning environment where anyone can learn or improve their digital skills for free.

Contact

  • CodeUp UK
  • Meetup
  • Slack
  • Twitter
  • Email Us
CodeUp is about free adult coding tuition for everyone. We offer a friendly space where anyone, from complete beginners to accomplished software engineers, can get together, learn and share a passion for coding.
Our sessions take place on the second Monday of every month at Code Computerlove. Everybody is welcome, regardless of coding ability or preferred technologies. You can sign up at the event page page any time for free!
We're always looking to improve. If you have any feedback, good or bad, please use our feedback form.

CodeUp Manchester is sponsored by Northcoders, the UK's leading coding school for graduate outcomes. The course is open to everyone, regardless of previous experience. Cohorts start every 2 weeks and support is provided from the moment you apply.
